messages.message:
What do you think about getting a shared seat in this javascript testing course: https://www.testingjavascript.com/
I think it'll be valuable to be more efficient while writing tests, and also learn the industry best practices. Could also help new folks get up and running quickly with testing.
The course covers the stack we're using. It's by Kent C. Dodds, author of react-testing-library, and I've found him to be a good instructor.
@Jessica who should we ask for budget?
